post.description: Authenticates a bot user by accepting Telegram User ID.
Registers a new user by accepting Telegram user ID and other basic details. Automatically generates password.
post.summary: Registers a new user via bot

post.description: Authenticates a user by accepting phone and password.
Clears the access and refresh tokens and logs out the user.
Refreshes the access token using the refresh token cookie.
Registers a new user by accepting basic details and password confirmation.

get.description: Retrieves all payments, sorted by payment date in descending order with pagination.
Retrieves the payment history for a specified user between two dates.
get.summary: Get payment history for a user

get.description: Retrieves the payments made by the current user, sorted by payment date in descending order with pagination.

post.description: Receives payment updates and updates the payment status in the database.
Creates a new profile for the current user

get.summary: Lists all profiles with pagination, auth required
Lists all active profiles with pagination, no auth required

get.description: Retrieves the profiles created by the currently authenticated user

put.description: User updates his own profile with the provided fields

post.description: Retrieves profiles based on filters provided in the query

put.description: Updates the profile with the given ID, allows updating specific fields

delete.description: Deletes the profile with the given ID from the database

get.description: Retrieves a profile based on the phone number provided
get.summary: Find a profile by phone number

get.description: Retrieves all services for a specific profile, with filtered data based on the user's tier.
get.summary: Get all services for a specific profile

get.description: Retrieves a service based on the profile ID and service ID, with filtered data based on the user's tier.
get.summary: Get a specific service by profile and service ID

put.description: Updates the user review for a service if the current user is authorized to do so and within the allowed time limit.
put.summary: Update a client's user review on a profile service

put.description: Set visibility of the profile owner's review based on the client's request. Only available for non-basic tier users.
put.summary: Set visibility of the profile owner's review

put.description: Allows a profile owner to update their review on a client user within the allowed time limit.
put.summary: Update the profile owner's review on a client user

put.description: Allows a profile owner to set user's review visibility. Only available for non-basic tier users.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of services with all related information.

post.description: Creates a new service between a client user and a profile, including optional ratings for both the profile and the user.

get.description: Retrieve a user by providing their user ID, Telegram user ID, or phone number. At least one of these fields is required.
get.summary: Get a user by ID, Telegram user ID, or phone

post.description: Allows admins to assign roles to users. Only admin can assign roles, and cannot assign roles to other admins or owners.
post.summary: Assign a role to a user

get.description: Retrieves the profile of the currently authenticated user

put.description: Allows the current user to update their own profile, including name, phone, and avatar.

delete.description: Allows the current user to delete their own account.

put.description: Allows privileged users to update user details, including Telegram ID, verification status, tier, and active status.

delete.description: Allows an authorized user to delete another user by their ID, with role-based restrictions.

models.ErrorResponse.description: This model is returned when an API call fails due to an error.

message.description:
Message provides a human-readable description of the error that occurred.
Example: "Invalid request payload"

status.description:
Status represents the status of the response, usually set to "error".
Example: "error"

paymentDate.description: date at which payment is completed

type.description: type: subscription, one_hour, three_hours, twelve_hours, two_days, one_week

bodyArtID.description: Part of composite primary key, and also a foreign key

profileTagID.description: Part of composite primary key, and also a foreign key

models.SuccessResponse.description: This model is returned when an API call succeeds.

data.description:
Data contains the result of the successful operation. Can be any type of data.
Example: {"id": 1, "name": "John Doe"}

status.description:
Status represents the status of the response, typically set to "success".
Example: "success"

models.TokenResponse.description: This model is used to return an access token after a user logs in or when a token is refreshed.

access_token.description:
AccessToken is the token that allows the user to authenticate subsequent API requests.
Example: "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."

status.description:
Status represents the status of the response, typically set to "success".
Example: "success"
